CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Under simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ) , a PCE of 4.6% has been achieved for PSCs composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM as the active layer in simply processed devices.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
---
PSFDTBT
PC71BM

(Note: PCE stands for "power conversion efficiency" and refers to a property of the solar cells, not a material.)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
---
PSFDTBT
PC71BM

(Note: I have reviewed the paragraph again and confirmed that both PSFDTBT and PC71BM are indeed material names.)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Under simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ) , a PCE of 4.6% has been achieved for PSCs composed of PSFDTBT and PC71BM as the active layer in simply processed devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G |
| 100 mW / cm^2 |
| PCE |
| PSCs |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. simulated solar illumination of AM 1.5G - a type of simulated sunlight with a specific spectral distribution
2. 100 mW / cm^2 - a measure of light intensity
3. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell
4. PSCs (Perovskite Solar Cells) - a type of solar cell
5. PSFDTBT (Poly[4-(2,6-difluorophenyl)hexyloxy-phenylenevinylene-co-2,5-di(hexyloxy)phenylenevinylene]) - a type of material used in the active layer of the solar cell
6. PC71BM ([6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester) - a type of material used in the active layer of the solar cell.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 100 mW / cm^2 |
| PCE |

After reviewing the entities, I have determined that only two of them clearly refer to material properties:

1. 100 mW / cm^2 - a measure of light intensity
2. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) - a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell.

The other entities in the paragraph are either specific materials or types of devices, and do not refer to material properties.
